example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP (ADJP (JJ 不同)) (NP (NN 属性))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 食材))) (VP (VP (VV 得) (VP (VV 搭配) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 不同))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 茶叶))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 才)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VRD (VV 烹调) (VV 出)) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 大)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 美味))))))))
